mapper.sql: id AS "id" , user_code AS "userCode" , user_account AS "userAccount" , user_email AS "userEmail" , user_type AS "userType" , mobile_number AS "mobileNumber" , login_pwd AS "loginPwd" , pwd_update_times AS "pwdUpdateTimes" , last_pwd_update_date AS "lastPwdUpdateDate" , user_nickname AS "userNickname" , user_name AS "userName" , user_sex AS "userSex" , user_birthday AS "userBirthday" , user_picture AS "userPicture" , id_type AS "idType" , id_number AS "idNumber" , user_status AS "userStatus" , user_status_change_cause AS "userStatusChangeCause" , user_status_change_date AS "userStatusChangeDate" , last_access_date AS "lastAccessDate" , create_user_code AS "createUserCode" , create_date AS "createDate" , update_user_code AS "updateUserCode" , update_date AS "updateDate" , delete_user_code AS "deleteUserCode" , delete_date AS "deleteDate"

sql.set: id = #{id}, user_code = #{userCode}, user_account = #{userAccount}, user_email = #{userEmail}, user_type = #{userType}, mobile_number = #{mobileNumber}, login_pwd = #{loginPwd}, pwd_update_times = #{pwdUpdateTimes}, last_pwd_update_date = #{lastPwdUpdateDate}, user_nickname = #{userNickname}, user_name = #{userName}, user_sex = #{userSex}, user_birthday = #{userBirthday}, user_picture = #{userPicture}, id_type = #{idType}, id_number = #{idNumber}, user_status = #{userStatus}, user_status_change_cause = #{userStatusChangeCause}, user_status_change_date = #{userStatusChangeDate}, last_access_date = #{lastAccessDate}, create_user_code = #{createUserCode}, create_date = #{createDate}, update_user_code = #{updateUserCode}, update_date = #{updateDate}, delete_user_code = #{deleteUserCode}, delete_date = #{deleteDate},

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_mal_mall_user_history ( id, user_code, user_account, user_email, user_type, mobile_number, login_pwd, pwd_update_times, last_pwd_update_date, user_nickname, user_name, user_sex, user_birthday, user_picture, id_type, id_number, user_status, user_status_change_cause, user_status_change_date, last_access_date, create_user_code, create_date, update_user_code, update_date, delete_user_code, delete_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userCode}, #{userAccount}, #{userEmail}, #{userType}, #{mobileNumber}, #{loginPwd}, #{pwdUpdateTimes}, #{lastPwdUpdateDate}, #{userNickname}, #{userName}, #{userSex}, #{userBirthday}, #{userPicture}, #{idType}, #{idNumber}, #{userStatus}, #{userStatusChangeCause}, #{userStatusChangeDate}, #{lastAccessDate}, #{createUserCode}, #{createDate}, #{updateUserCode}, #{updateDate}, #{deleteUserCode}, #{deleteDate} )
